description: This file defines the main React application component for a web frontend. It manages theme toggling, sets up routing with protected routes, and includes the main navigation UI. It imports routing components, configuration functions, and custom route components, configuring the root application behavior and navigation.

methods.name: useActivePath
methods.description: Custom hook that retrieves the current pathname from react-router's useLocation hook for highlighting the active navigation link.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main application component managing theme state, API base initialization, and routing configuration.

methods.name: Navigation
methods.description: Internal component rendering the navigation links with active styling based on current path.
